Question: C-Smartlink Information Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
C-Smartlink Information Technology Co., Ltd.

PD3.1 140W 24000mAh Power Bank

- 140W PD Powerbank for Macbook Pro
- High Capacity: 24000mAh
- LED display for battery capacity, fast charger, input power, and output power
- Compact size for travel and daily use
- Material: ABS+PC V0 standard (Fireproof material casing, grade V0)
- Protection functions: Short-circuit protection, Overcharger protection, Overdischarger protection, Overcurrent protection, OTP (over temperature protection)
